mapper.select: -- 根据Id 查询successKilled并携带Seckilled信息 select sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.create_time, sk.state, s.seckill_id as "seckill.seckill_id", s.name as "seckill.name", s.number as "seckill.number", s.start_time "seckill.start_time", s.end_time "seckill.end_time", s.create_time "seckill.create_time" from success_killed sk, inner join seckill s on sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id where sk.seckill_id = #{seckillId}
